metadata.name: Uninstall Sysinternals Sysmon
metadata.comment: Detects the removal of Sysmon, which could be a potential attempt at defense evasion

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('2') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sysmon64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sysmon.exe'))) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('system activity monitor') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―u'))))

output.summary: Detects the removal of Sysmon, which could be a potential attempt at defense evasion

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrators might use this command to remove Sysmon for debugging purposes Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1562.001/T1562.001.md#atomic-test-11---uninstall-sysmon
